job.title: ServiceNow Developer
job.description: <p><strong><u>JOB DESCRIPTION:</u></strong></p><p><br></p><p><strong><u>Required US Citizen Only</u></strong></p><p><br></p><p>•	Actively participate in agile daily scrums and ceremonies, updating stories daily in SNOW documenting development progress and collaborating across platform teams</p><p>•	Support and participate in customer requirement workshops, working with product owner/stakeholders to configure requested items and tasks using Flow Designer to manage processes and meet business requirements</p><p>•	Develop applications (scoped and out of the box) working with ServiceNow Studio</p><p>•	Design, create and configure Notifications, UI Pages, UI Macros, Script Includes, Formatters, etc.</p><p>•	Design, create and configure Business Rules, UI Policies, UI Actions, Client Scripts and ACLs including advanced scripting of each (including CMS/Service Portal)</p><p>•	Support in the development of use cases and testing procedures, ensuring product functionality, debugging and testing is completed prior to production deployment</p><p>•	Create and maintain system design and operations documentation</p><p>•	Build automated testing in ServiceNow ATF</p><p>•	Ensure all development is created in alignment with ServiceNow Technical Best Practices</p><p><br></p><p><strong><u>Education and Requirements: </u></strong></p><p><br></p><p>•	Minimum of Bachelors Degree or equivalency and 10 years’ experience</p><p>•	Extensive understanding of the ways in which ServiceNow can be configured and customized and scripting within the tool</p><p>•	Experience integrating ServiceNow with external systems through SOAP or REST web services</p><p>•	Experience with the ServiceNow Studio IDE</p><p>•	Experience using the Workflow Editor to configure workflows</p><p>•	Experience with HTML5, JAVA, JavaScript, jQuery, CSS, Angular.js</p>
